00034 #define MAPROWCOLTOPOS( r, c )                                                      ( ( (r < 0) || (r >= WORLD_ROWS) || (c < 0) || (c >= WORLD_COLS) ) ? ( 0xffff ) : ( (r) * WORLD_COLS + (c) ) )

00036 #define GETWORLDINDEXFROMWORLDCOORDS( r, c )          ( (INT16) ( r / CELL_X_SIZE ) ) * WORLD_COLS + ( (INT16) ( c / CELL_Y_SIZE ) )
